entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Excel Addin Setup File - Could not load file or assembly 'System.Buffers, Version=4.0.2.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=cc7b13ffcd2ddd51' #38019
  • Can't remove entries from SdkSupportedTargetPlatformVersion without removing _OR_GREATER defines #38016
  • malloc error during `dotnet restore`on MacOs #38014
  • [Regression] APICompat / PackageValidation runs without a runtime graph #38013
    8.0.1xx

Closed

  • Question: State of C++/CLI with dotnet #37667
    Discussion
  • Use `packages.lock.json` instead of `project.assets.json`, if available #35556
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Add filtering to SdkSupportedTargetPlatformVersion validation. Fixes #38016. #38017
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Install scripts update validation PR #38006
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #37999
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37851
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Identify riscv64 as valid arch #37994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Install manifests for rollback after update --from-rollback-file #37965
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them. #37832
    Servicing-consider, Area-Containers
  • Ensure dotnet/aspnet base image can be inferred for ASP.Net applications #37996
    Servicing-consider, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #37954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2353448 #37964
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
